src_original: The Buddha teaches to Śuddhodana  atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
yāṃ śrutvā rājñā śuddhodanena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāktkṛtam;
idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtam; na pitrā,
yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;  ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ;
